text: Zoziase latini, é wɛlɛ ʋolu, é kabaiti ka, ti ɠɛni ná gizei ma. É nuiti teʋeni, ti ʋa ga nu ɠaeiti, é ti ɠala zalaɠa ɠulazuʋɛ, é ná ɠɔzɔ ga naa, eɠɛʋelei Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI boni la, é ɠula GALA goo wo nui la, tɔɔzei naama wooiti ka é ti woni siɛgi zu masagi Zeloɓoame ɠɛni loni la zalaɠa ɠulazuʋɛ ɠakalaʋɛ fɛti ɠula ziɛgi zu. Zoziase latini, é Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-GALA goo wo nui naa ná-kabai ʋɛtɛ.
